articles.title: 21 Americans Infected With Monkeypox, C.D.C. Reports - The New York Times
articles.description: As the number of cases outside Africa approaches 800, governments are scrambling for a limited pool of vaccines and treatments with unclear effectiveness.
articles.content:
ACAM2000 cannot be used in pregnant women, infants or those who are immunocompromised exactly the people who most need protection from the monkeypox virus.

articles.title: Monkeypox patients in Boston and NYC sought out medical treatment MULTIPLE times in early May - Daily Mail
articles.description: Both of America's first two monkeypox patients had first experienced symptoms of the virus on May 4. All but one case, in Northern Virginia, is among a man who has sex with other men.
